response.original_title: Dua Matahari Terbenam di Ujung Kota
response.overview: Galuh (24), a young man on the brink of despair in his search, meets Riko (26), whose life is the polar opposite of his own. This encounter brings a major change to Galuh's life. However, a series of oddities continue to occur, as if fate never intends to allow Galuh a peaceful life.
response.title: Dua Matahari Terbenam di Ujung Kota
